item.description:
We have a large group attending the movie tonight. For the people who want to meet for dinner - we are planning on meeting at 6:30 at Panera's in Hadley. Pat from "Spice of Life too short" will be wearing an orange baseball cap and will be holding a small orange sign that says MEETUP. My picture is posted so you can also look for me.

If you are just going to the movie, look for the orange baseball cap in the line. We plan on being outside the movie theater at the Hampshire Mall around 7:45. We will be going in the theater shortly after so we can try and get seats together. Should be a good movie and a great group...one of the largest we have had so far. Remember, it is best to get your movie ticket BEFORE dinner.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Dinner at Panera's at 6:30 or outside the movie theater at the Hampshire Mall
item.name: Movie Night: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
